item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Good find Ohsnap! Looks like WoW Insider forgot to credit you with the catch. That's so unlike them.
item.content:encoded: Good find Ohsnap! Looks like WoW Insider forgot to credit you with the catch. That’s so unlike them.

item.title: By: Lassirra
item.dc:creator: Lassirra
item.description:
The look on his face is just priceless.
Now all you need is entrance music and a signature dance move. (Too bad /dance in LotRO is kinda blah, compared to other MMOs, unless they've changed it since the Beta.)
item.content:encoded:
The look on his face is just priceless.

Now all you need is entrance music and a signature dance move.
(Too bad /dance in LotRO is kinda blah, compared to other MMOs, unless they’ve changed it since the Beta.)

item.title: By: Errant Thoughts » Blog Archive » Thinkpak Review!
item.dc:creator: Errant Thoughts » Blog Archive » Thinkpak Review!
item.description: [...] In unrelated news, if you’re a LotRO fan, check out Foton’s new character (mildly maybe-NSFW). He seems to have decided to explore Hobbits & hunters in a rather unusual way. I never thought of Hobbits that way before, but hey. Keep an open mind, right? …Right? [...]
item.content:encoded: […] In unrelated news, if you’re a LotRO fan, check out Foton’s new character (mildly maybe-NSFW). He seems to have decided to explore Hobbits & hunters in a rather unusual way. I never thought of Hobbits that way before, but hey. Keep an open mind, right? …Right? […]

item.title: By: Scipio
item.dc:creator: Scipio
item.description: Middlesex, Wessex. Oddly, they're all English place names.
item.content:encoded: Middlesex, Wessex. Oddly, they’re all English place names.

item.title: By: Cameron Sorden
item.dc:creator: Cameron Sorden
item.description:
Well, there's lots of legitimate words with sex in them. Essex, Sexton... uh... umm.. *headscratch* Yeah. Nevermind. That's weird. They should know better.
Party on, Brott.
item.content:encoded:
Well, there’s lots of legitimate words with sex in them. Essex, Sexton… uh… umm.. *headscratch* Yeah. Nevermind. That’s weird. They should know better.

Party on, Brott.

item.title: By: Heather

hehe... it's the mischievous smirk on his face that really does it. nice work.
item.content:encoded:
